TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Literal extends System.Web.UI.Control
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Literal extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.ITextControl
Public Class Literal Inherits Control Implements ITextControl
public ref class Literal : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::ITextControl
type Literal = class inherit Control interface ITextControl

summary.span: 在网页上保留显示静态文本的位置。

span.span: Reserves a location on the Web page to display static text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [简介Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 简介Introduction 使用控件在网页 上保留显示文本的位置。Use the control to reserve a location on the Web page to display text. 控件与 控件相似，不同之处在于控件不 允许将样式应用于显示的文本。The control is similar to the control, except the control does not allow you to apply a style to the displayed text. 可以通过设置属性，以编程方式控制在控件中显示的文本 。You can programmatically control the text displayed in the control by setting the property. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入，其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前，请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 还提供验证服务器控件以评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关安全性的详细信息，请参阅 [保护标准控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178270(v=vs.100))， [如何：通过将 HTML 编码应用到字符串](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/a2a4yykt(v=vs.100))，并 [在 ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/7kh55542(v=vs.100))来防范 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击。For more information about security, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178270(v=vs.100)), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/a2a4yykt(v=vs.100)), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/7kh55542(v=vs.100)). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 控件显示静态文本。The following example demonstrates how to use the control to display static text. > [!NOTE] > 下面的示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，可能无法正常工作。The following example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information about the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[Literal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Literal/CS/literalcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Literal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Literal/VB/literalvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Notifies the control that an XML or HTML element was parsed and adds that element to the of the control.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 自定义服务器控件中的方法，以便它始终将 属性设置为分析的对象的 `Text` 属性，如果分析的对象是 ，则为; 否则为空 `string` 。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always sets the property to the parsed object's `Text` property, if the parsed object is a , and to an empty `string` otherwise. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomLiteralAddParsedSubObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLiteralAddParsedSubObject/CS/custom_literal_addparsedsubobjectcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomLiteralAddParsedSubObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLiteralAddParsedSubObject/VB/custom_literal_addparsedsubobjectvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomLiteralAddParsedSubObject#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLiteralAddParsedSubObject/CS/custom_literal_addparsedsubobject.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomLiteralAddParsedSubObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLiteralAddParsedSubObject/VB/custom_literal_addparsedsubobject.vb#2)]

summary.span: 在控件上设置输入焦点； 基控件方法在 控件上不受支持。

span.span: Set input focus to a control; the base control method is not supported on a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件重写 基类的方法。The control overrides the method of the base class. 控件的方法 始终引发异常以指示 控件上不支持该方法 。The method of a control always throws an exception to indicate that the method is not supported on a control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::LiteralMode Mode { System::Web::UI::WebControls::LiteralMode get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::LiteralMode value); };
member this.Mode : System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralMode with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个枚举值，该值指定如何呈现 控件中的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets an enumeration value that specifies how the content in the control is rendered.
One of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用 属性指定控件内容的 呈现方式。Use the property to specify how the contents of a control should be rendered. 使用枚举值之一设置此属性 。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`PassThrough`|不修改控件的内容。The contents of the control are not modified.| |`Encode`|控件的内容将转换为 HTML 编码的字符串。The contents of the control are converted to an HTML-encoded string.| |`Transform`|将从控件的内容中删除不受支持的标记语言元素。Unsupported markup-language elements are removed from the contents of the control. 如果 控件在支持 HTML 或 XHTML 的浏览器上呈现，则不修改控件的内容。If the control is rendered on a browser that supports HTML or XHTML, the control's contents are not modified.| 如果指定，则会将 `PassThrough` 属性的全部内容 传递到设备或浏览器，而不进行任何修改。If you specify `PassThrough`, the entire contents of the property are passed to the device or browser without making any modifications. 例如，如果控件的 属性 包含标记，则会 `
` 将其发送到所有设备和浏览器，无论其是否受支持。For example, if the property of a control contains an `
` tag, it is sent to all devices and browsers whether it is supported or not. 如果指定 `Encode` ，则在 呈现之前，属性的内容将转换为 HTML 编码的字符串。If you specify `Encode`, the contents for the property are converted into an HTML-encoded string before rendering. 例如，如果控件的 属性 包含 `
` 标记，则该属性将转换为 `<Hr>` 并发送到设备或浏览器。For example, if the property of a control contains an `
` tag, it is converted to `<Hr>` and sent to the device or browser. 如果指定 `Transform` ，属性的呈现行为 取决于所呈现的标记的类型。If you specify `Transform`, the rendering behavior of the property depends on the type of markup being rendered. 为 支持 HTML 或 XHTML 的设备或浏览器呈现控件时，指定将 生成与指定相同的行为 。When the control is rendered for a device or browser that supports HTML or XHTML, specifying produces the same behavior as specifying . 为 请求浏览器呈现属性的所有标记和元素。All markup tags and elements for the property are rendered for the requesting browser. 如果为 除 HTML 或 XHTML 之外的标记语言（如 WML 或 cHTML）呈现控件，可以使用 值来删除不支持的标记元素。When the control is rendered for a markup language other than HTML or XHTML, such as WML or cHTML, you can use the value to remove unsupported markup elements. 在这种情况下， 不会为控件呈现在目标标记语言中不支持的属性的任何标记语言元素。In this case, any markup language elements of the property that are not supported in the targeted markup language are not rendered for the control. 例如，如果控件的 属性 包含标记，则在将 `
` 内容发送到 WML 设备之前，将删除该标记。For example, if the property of a control contains an `
` tag, the tag is removed before the content is sent to a WML device. 如果不受支持的标记包含内容，则仅删除标记，并将内容发送到设备或浏览器。If an unsupported tag contains content, only the tag is removed and the content is sent to the device or browser. 例如，如果 属性包含内容 `Test` ，则 `` `` 会删除和标记，并向设备或浏览器发送文本 "Test"。For example, if the property contains the content `Test`, the `` and `` tags are removed, and the text "Test" is sent to the device or browser. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 控件的 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to set a control's property. 属性最初 `Encode` 在控件的声明性语法中设置为。The property is initially set to `Encode` in the declarative syntax for the control. 加载页面后，用户可以单击按钮，将 属性设置为 `PassThrough` 。After the page loads, the user can click a button to set the property to `PassThrough`. 这会使属性的内容 以不同的方式呈现。This causes the contents of the property to render differently. > [!NOTE] > 下面的示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，可能无法正常工作。The following example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information about the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-vb[Literal.Mode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Literal.Mode/VB/literal.modevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 自定义服务器控件中的方法，以便在之前始终显示特定文本 。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that specific text is always displayed before the . [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomLiteralRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLiteralRender/CS/custom_literal_rendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomLiteralRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLiteralRender/VB/custom_literal_rendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomLiteralRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLiteralRender/CS/custom_literal_render.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomLiteralRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLiteralRender/VB/custom_literal_render.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Text : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置在 控件中显示的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the caption displayed in the control.

value.span: 在 控件中显示的标题。

span.span: The caption displayed in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定或确定控件中显示的标题 。Use the property to specify or determine the caption displayed in the control. 这使您可以在运行时以编程方式更改标题。This allows you to programmatically change the caption at run time. 标题是 HTML 解码的，具体取决于您为此属性指定值的方式。The caption is HTML-decoded depending on how you assign a value to this property. 如果通过控件的属性分配一个值，则在 显示值之前会对其进行 HTML 解码。If you assign a value through an attribute of the control, the value is HTML decoded before it is displayed. 例如，在 `` 浏览器上呈现为 "A B"。For example, `` is rendered as "A B" on the browser. 但是，如果您以编程方式或通过在控件的开始和结束标记之间放置文本来设置此属性，则不会对标题进行 HTML 解码。However, if you set this property programmatically or by placing the text between the opening and closing tags of the control, the caption is not HTML decoded. 例如， ` A B ` 呈现为 "A   B"。For example, ` A B ` is rendered as "A B". > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入，其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前，请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 还提供验证服务器控件以评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [验证服务器控制语法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以 编程方式更改控件中显示的标题 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically change the caption displayed in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，可能无法正常工作。The following example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information about the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)).
